title: France panorama. [No. 69/42]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items: 1. Horse racing at the Longchomp Race Course. 2. An exhibition at the Museum of Modern Art by a Brazilian artist living in Paris. 3. The 56th Auto Show: Many impatient visitors flock to the show as France stops for what is one of the highlights for the year. 4. From the Moon: The Apollo XI mission is acclaimed in Paris. Many French dignitaries greet Neil Armstrong et al as they enter Paris as part of their world tour. 5. The Theatre of Paris celebrates the birth of J. Offenbach 150 years ago.
